alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Greene; Logan; Miami; Montgomery; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHAMPAIGN, SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN, WESTERN CLARK, NORTHWESTERN GREENE AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near West Mansfield to 7 miles southwest of Trotwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Springfield, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Trotwood, Vandalia, Englewood, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Tipp City, Bellbrook, Moraine, New Carlisle, Oakwood, Wright-Patterson Afb, Northridge, West Carrollton and Enon. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 27 and 53. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 46 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Greene; Logan; Miami; Montgomery; Union
